name: Spite
description: You unleash a shriek of pure malice at a creature within a short (10 unit) distance. The target must make a resilience check of 8 or take 10 psychic damage. If they roll a 4 or less on their check, they also become stunned. This spell requires the target to be able to hear.
charge: The spell becomes an area effect with a 3 unit radius centered on a point you can see within a short (10 unit) distance. All creatures in the area must make a resilience check of 10 or take 10 psychic damage and 10 dark damage. Creatures that roll a 5 or less become stunned.
